title: Activity-Based Learning Project for Online Music Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory, instrumental performance experience, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Post-COVID-19 emphasis on designing music education in remote learning environments. Project-centered design promoting students' practical application capabilities and active learning participation

learning_goals: Learners can apply three core principles of Activity-Based Learning when designing music education projects in an online environment.
Learners can produce small-scale music education content using digital tools (DAW, collaboration platforms) and incorporate feedback.
Learners can complete a music education design document (including learning objectives, activity design, and evaluation criteria) as a project outcome.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
